meanings.sent1: The twinnings of the two babies brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: The twinnings of the siblings made them inseparable.
meanings.sent3: The twinnings of the puppies made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent4: The twinnings of the vines created a beautiful pattern in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The twinnings of the DNA were evident in their physical similarities.

meanings.definition: A relationship or connection between twins.
meanings.sent1: The strong twinnings between the sisters was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The twinnings between the brothers was evident in their shared interests.
meanings.sent3: The twinnings between the twins made others envious of their bond.
meanings.sent4: The twinnings between the stars in the sky seemed magical.
meanings.sent5: The twinnings between the characters in the story added depth to the plot.

meanings.definition: The process of intertwining or twisting together.
meanings.sent1: The intricate twinnings of the ropes created a strong knot.
meanings.sent2: The twinnings of the threads formed a beautiful fabric.
meanings.sent3: The twinnings of the branches in the wind looked like a dance.
meanings.sent4: The twinnings of the rivers symbolized unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The twinnings of the roads in the city made navigation confusing.
